name: HITMAN: Jothamesburg
description:
For my Honours Project at the University of Central Lancashire (UCLan), I designed my own HITMAN level based in the fictional Jothamesburg University.

My level is a sandbox - meaning there are multiple ways of eliminating the targets. Disguise yourself in different costumes and infiltrate the various buildings of Jothamesburg University! Hunt for the secret underground and explore the secrets hidden within the old University!

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL96mt8rcsyPLydyLv9-5dAL3QWHEhtegb

UCLan Games Design: https://gamescourse.co.uk/
UCLan Games Design Blog: https://gamescourse.blogspot.com/
Music: https://www.bensound.com

I do not own, nor claim to own any aspect of the HITMAN brand,
and this project is meant for purely educational purposes.
